languages.text: Словно ведомые рукой самого Императора, корабли, украшенные гербом династии Чорда, окружают ксеносов. Залп смертоносных снарядов вырывается из орудий — и превращает крохотное судно в беспорядочное скопление космического мусора.

traits.locale_text: Словно ведомые рукой самого Императора, корабли, украшенные гербом династии Чорда, уверенно окружают оставшееся судно ксеносов. Залп смертоносных снарядов вырывается из их орудий и превращает крохотное судно в беспорядочное скопление космического мусора.

languages.text: As if guided by the Emperor's hand, the voidships adorned with the Chorda coat of arms surround the xenos. Deadly salvos erupt from their cannons and pulverise the tiny Aeldari vessel into lifeless debris.
languages.original_text: Словно ведомые рукой самого Императора, корабли, украшенные гербом династии Чорда, окружают ксеносов. Залп смертоносных снарядов вырывается из орудий — и превращает крохотное судно в беспорядочное скопление космического мусора.

traits.locale_text: As if guided by the Emperor's hand, voidships adorned with the House Chorda crest surround the remaining xenos vessel. Salvos of deadly missiles erupt from their cannons and pulverise the tiny Aeldari vessel into lifeless debris.

As if guided by the Emperor's hand, the voidships adorned with the Chorda coat of arms surround the xenos. Deadly salvos erupt from their cannons and pulverise the tiny Aeldari vessel into lifeless debris.

As if guided by the Emperor's hand, the voidships adorned with the Chorda coat of arms surround the xenos. Deadly salvos erupt from their cannons and pulverise the tiny Aeldari vessel into lifeless debris.

As if guided by the Emperor's hand, the voidships adorned with the Chorda coat of arms surround the xenos. Deadly salvos erupt from their cannons and pulverise the tiny Aeldari vessel into lifeless debris.

languages.text: Comme guidés par la main de l'Empereur, les vaisseaux ornés des armoiries des Chorda entourent les xénos, puis leurs canons lâchent des salves mortelles qui pulvérisent le petit vaisseau aeldari.
languages.original_text: As if guided by the Emperor's hand, the voidships adorned with the Chorda coat of arms surround the xenos. Deadly salvos erupt from their cannons and pulverise the tiny Aeldari vessel into lifeless debris.

traits.locale_text: Comme guidés par la main de l'Empereur, les vaisseaux ornés des armoiries des Chorda entourent les xénos, puis leurs canons lâchent des salves mortelles qui pulvérisent le petit vaisseau aeldari.

languages.text: 皇帝の手に導かれるように、チョーダの紋章をあしらったヴォイドシップが異種族を取り囲む。その大砲から強力な弾丸が発射され、アエルダリの小さな艦船を粉々に粉砕した。
languages.original_text: As if guided by the Emperor's hand, the voidships adorned with the Chorda coat of arms surround the xenos. Deadly salvos erupt from their cannons and pulverise the tiny Aeldari vessel into lifeless debris.

traits.locale_text: 皇帝の手に導かれるように、チョーダの紋章をあしらったヴォイドシップが異種族を取り囲む。その大砲から強力な弾丸が発射され、アエルダリの小さな艦船を粉々に粉砕した。

languages.text: 装饰着库尔达家族盾徽的虚空舰围住了那艘异形飞船。随后，仿佛得到了帝皇之手的指引，他们的宏炮发出致命的齐射，将那艘小小的艾达灵族飞船撕成了毫无生气的碎片。
languages.original_text: As if guided by the Emperor's hand, the voidships adorned with the Chorda coat of arms surround the xenos. Deadly salvos erupt from their cannons and pulverise the tiny Aeldari vessel into lifeless debris.

traits.locale_text: 装饰着库尔达家族盾徽的虚空舰围住了那艘异形飞船。随后，仿佛得到了帝皇之手的指引，他们的宏炮发出致命的齐射，将那艘小小的艾达灵族飞船撕成了毫无生气的碎片。

languages.text: Como guiadas por la mano del Emperador, las naves del vacío adornadas con el escudo de armas de Chorda rodean a los xenos. Sus cañones lanzan mortíferas salvas que pulverizan la pequeña nave Aeldari y la convierten en escombros sin vida.
languages.original_text: As if guided by the Emperor's hand, the voidships adorned with the Chorda coat of arms surround the xenos. Deadly salvos erupt from their cannons and pulverise the tiny Aeldari vessel into lifeless debris.

traits.locale_text: Como guiadas por la mano del Emperador, las naves del vacío adornadas con el escudo de armas de Chorda rodean a los xenos. Sus cañones lanzan mortíferas salvas que pulverizan la pequeña nave Aeldari y la convierten en escombros sin vida.

languages.text: Wie von der Hand des Imperators geführt umzingeln die mit dem Chorda-Wappen verzierten Raumschiffe die Xenos. Tödliche Salven feuern aus ihren Geschützen und pulverisieren das winzige Aeldari-Schiff zu leblosem Schutt.
languages.original_text: As if guided by the Emperor's hand, the voidships adorned with the Chorda coat of arms surround the xenos. Deadly salvos erupt from their cannons and pulverise the tiny Aeldari vessel into lifeless debris.

traits.locale_text: Wie von der Hand des Imperators geführt umzingeln die mit dem Chorda-Wappen verzierten Raumschiffe die Xenos. Tödliche Salven feuern aus ihren Geschützen und pulverisieren das winzige Aeldari-Schiff zu leblosem Schutt.

languages.text: Chorda armasını taşıyan uçsuz gemileri, sanki İmparator'un eliyle yönlendiriliyormuş gibi zenoları kuşatıyor. Toplarından ateşlenen ölümcül salvolar, küçük Aeldari gemisini cansız bir enkaza dönüştürüyor.
languages.original_text: As if guided by the Emperor's hand, the voidships adorned with the Chorda coat of arms surround the xenos. Deadly salvos erupt from their cannons and pulverise the tiny Aeldari vessel into lifeless debris.
